name: train
description: Sends a single training question to be answered

options.name: subject
options.description: Optional subject to be used as a filter

name: help
description: Replies with a help message explaining what the bot can do

name: rounds

options.name: generate
options.description: Generates a round with randomized questions from https://scibowldb.com/

options.name: list
options.description: Lists your 5 most recently generated rounds with links

options.name: hit
options.description: Shows the total number of rounds hit as well as the number for the specific user

description: Commands regarding rounds generated by AwesomeSciBo

name: top
description: Lists top ten scores across servers (server specific leaderboard WIP)

name: about

options.name: contributors
options.description: Lists contributors to the AwesomeSciBo bot

options.name: changelog
options.description: Lists the 5 most recent changes in a "git log" type format

description: Commands regarding the creation/development of the bot

options.name: winner
options.description: The advancing team from the regional

options.name: runner-up
options.description: The second-place team from the regional

options.name: third-place
options.description: The third-place team from the regional

options.name: honorable-mentions
options.description: Any extra teams to be mentioned or a space for technicalities to be explained
